University College, Durham

Graduating class of 2002

20 year reunion dinner

Welcome Message

Dear Friends,

2022 is a year of important anniversaries. Most spectacularly, on 6th February this year Her Majesty The Queen became the first British Monarch to celebrate a Platinum Jubilee, marking 70 years of service to the people of the United Kingdom, the Realms and the Commonwealth.

To celebrate this unprecedented Royal anniversary, events and initiatives will take place throughout 2022 in the United Kingdom, the Commonwealth and globally, culminating in the 20 Year Reunion of the University College Durham Graduating Class of 2002.

A lot has happened since we graduated from Durham and from Castle in 2002 and we are delighted to announce that we are organising a 20 Year Reunion Dinner, to be held in London. Hopefully, the date – Saturday 12 November 2022 – and location – The East India Club, London – mean that as many people as possible can attend.

Please join us to reconnect and celebrate together in what plans to be a great evening. Please forward this website link and the details of this dinner to as many Castle Class of 2002 alumni as possible. On this website you will find various bits of helpful info. Please do get in touch at Castle2002reunion@gmail.com with any and all questions. And please come and have fun on Saturday 12 November!

Best wishes,

Stephen Withnell, Sarah Chapman, Victoria Rubin, Joseph McIntyre, Giles Travers

Date & Time

Saturday 12th November 2022

7pm until Late

Venue

The East India Club, London
SW1Y 4LH
